section.title: Changing &TEXMF; run-time parameters
section.para: You can control a number of run-time parameters (in particular, array sizes) on the command-line or in a configuration file.
Some of the more interesting paramaters:

listitem.para: Total words of memory available, for &TeX;, &METAFONT;, and &MetaPost;.
Extra space for large &TeX; data structures: boxes, glue, breakpoints, et al.
Words of font info available for &TeX;.
